site_name: Land Between North End And Tamworth Road To The North Of Frith Road And Drummond Road, Croydon
description: Variation of condition 2 of planning permission 18/03740/CONR which was for the: Variation of condition 7 (hours of deliveries) attached to planning permission 98/02558/P (for the demolition of the existing buildings and erection of 37,676m2 of retail floorspace, 1,323m2 of A3 (Food and drink) floorspace and 2,991 of leisure floorpace (bingo hall) in a multi level building with pedestrian malls linking North End, Tamworth Road and the existing Drummond Centre Mall, together with 990 public car parking spaces, alterations to and closure of existing public highways and footpaths and the formation of new roads and footpaths).  To allow deliveries in both Service Yard A and Service Yard B to take place between the hours of 06:00 - 20:00 Monday to Sunday.
